title: Higher RP Prices???

embed.description: Greetings summoners, I'm Mirko (MasterMirkinen) and I head up Riot Oceania. I just want to take a moment to talk to you about RP Prices. In an effort to ensure price equality on the server and respond to rising costs caused by recent economic shifts, we are adjusting the cost of RP in Oceania.

body: As you may know, Riot is increasing the prices for RP. The fact that millions of people play League of Legends and spend money is ok. But the thing that puzzles me is why is Riot increasing the prices when they earn SO much already. So tell me if you want RP prices to stay the same or increase in the comments below and by voting in the Poll.

replies.body: Upvote this if the sun makes you feel warm!
